thirstful.client.color.contaminatedWater: Sets the color of contaminated water in a cauldron. Mixed with dirty water if also dirty. Note: Press F3+A to reload chunks after changing.
thirstful.client.color.dirtyWaterColor.d: Sets the color of dirty water in a cauldron. Mixed with contaminated water if also contaminated. Note: Press F3+A to reload chunks after changing.
thirstful.common.statusEffect.coolingEff: Cooling effect temperature change per tick
Temperature change per tick from the cooling effect per level of cooling
thirstful.common.statusEffect.feverEffec: Fever effect temperature change per tick
Temperature rise from the fever effect per level of fever
thirstful.common.statusEffect.feverMinTe: Feverish entities have their temperature rise until it reaches this scale
thirstful.common.statusEffect.warmingEff: Warming effect temperature change per tick
Temperature change per tick from the warming effect per level of warming
thirstful.common.thirst.maxThirstTicks.d: How long a player can go without drinking before death, in ticks (default: 2 days)
thirstful.common.thirst.potionStackSize: Potion item default max stack size
Modifies the max stack size of potions (must be between 1 and 99). Requires a restart.
